    ConditionalAdvancement
    A `ConditionalAdvancement` is a single advancment file that contains multiple advancements, each having a condition.

    ConditionalRecipe
    So, A 'ConditionalRecipe' differs from all normal recipes in the fact that in addition to the conditions disabling the entire recipe, it has sub-recipes that themselves have conditions.
